name.ja: <ruby>妖精伝姫<rt>フェアリーテイル</rt></ruby>のはじまりはじまり
name.zh-CN: 妖精传姬要开始啰要开始啰

text.en: Special Summon up to 1 LIGHT "Fairy Tail" monster each from your hand, GY, and banishment, with different names, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Spellcaster monsters. If this card is sent to the GY, except from the field, or banished: You can Set this card, but it cannot be activated unless you control a "Fairy Tail" monster. You can only use each effect of "Fairy Tail Long Long Ago" once per turn.
